metadata.title: Participant Management
metadata.description: Simplify your participant management with Event Logic's comprehensive tools for invitations, registrations, and communication.

title: Participant Management
subtitle: Simplify your participant management with Event Logic's comprehensive tools for invitations, registrations, and communication.

customInvitations.title: Custom Invitations
customInvitations.description: Create beautiful, branded invitations with our easy-to-use editor. Include all the essential information about your event and customize the design to match your brand.

registrationForms.title: Registration Forms
registrationForms.description: Create custom registration forms to collect exactly the information you need from participants. Add questions about dietary requirements, travel preferences, workshop choices, and more.

automatedReminders.title: Automated Reminders
automatedReminders.description: Set up automated reminders to be sent to participants before the event. Reduce no-shows and ensure everyone has the latest information about your event.

createInvitation.title: Create Your Invitation
createInvitation.description1: Design your invitation using our intuitive editor. Choose from templates or create your own design. Include all the essential information about your event, such as date, time, location, and agenda.
createInvitation.description2: You can also add images, logos, and custom colors to match your brand identity.

buildForm.title: Build Your Registration Form
buildForm.description1: Create a custom registration form to collect the information you need from participants. Add standard fields like name and email, as well as custom questions specific to your event.
buildForm.description2: You can include questions about dietary requirements, travel preferences, workshop choices, and more. Make fields required or optional as needed.

sendInvitations.title: Send Invitations
sendInvitations.description1: Send your invitations to participants via email. You can import your contact list or enter email addresses manually. Each invitation includes a unique link to the registration form.
sendInvitations.description2: You can also schedule when to send the invitations and set up reminder emails for those who haven't responded.

trackResponses.title: Track Responses
trackResponses.description1: Monitor responses in real-time through your dashboard. See who has accepted, declined, or not yet responded to your invitation. View all registration information in one place.
trackResponses.description2: You can export participant data to Excel or CSV for further analysis or to share with suppliers and team members.

communicate.title: Communicate with Participants
communicate.description1: Send updates, reminders, and additional information to participants before, during, and after the event. You can send messages to all participants or filter by specific criteria.
communicate.description2: Participants can also update their information if their plans change, ensuring you always have the most up-to-date information.

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.description: Automate the invitation and registration process, eliminating the need for manual tracking and follow-ups. Our system handles everything from sending invitations to collecting responses.

reduceErrors.title: Reduce Errors
reduceErrors.description: Eliminate manual data entry and the risk of errors. Participants enter their own information, which is automatically stored in your event database.
items: Validation of email addresses and required fields
Participants can update their own information

improveCommunication.title: Improve Communication
improveCommunication.description: Keep participants informed with timely updates and reminders. Ensure everyone has the information they need for a successful event experience.
items: Targeted messages to specific participant groups

enhanceExperience.title: Enhance Participant Experience
enhanceExperience.description: Provide a seamless and professional experience for your participants from invitation to post-event follow-up.

cta.title: Ready to simplify your participant management?
cta.description: Join thousands of event planners who use Event Logic to manage their participants efficiently.
